" again, Betty White quips, "I think you do a thing once and then you run like a thief." David Letterman then asks her what she does in her free time and Betty White says, Oh, I like to do most anything. Play with animals, mostly. And vodka's kind of a hobby. So David Letterman reaches down from behind the desk and produces a bottle of Grey Goose, to which Betty White laughs heartily. They share some vodka, then she does a classic spit-take.
